This blog will be based around the chimpanzee and the numbers that are left. To fully view the effect of their numbers, hover your mouse over the text while reading. Move your mouse off your screen or to the sides to view the text.

Blog 5: Critical Analysis of Façade

My façade Written by Sachin Govender (2262800).

The website at its current point is still in its very early development stages, at its current point the idea behind the website is to express my interest in video games and movies by displaying video game as well as movie art. I had chosen these themes as it was one of the two things that allowed me to connect with friends and family especially due to the lockdown that happened due to Covid. The idea is to then share movies and video games that I enjoyed and helped connect me with my friends and to hopefully introduce the viewers to these to help them connect with their friends and families in this way.

Refrences

Carrier, D. C. (2020, May 16). The Work of Art in the Age of the Internet. HYPERALLERGIC. Retrieved March 13, 2022, from https://hyperallergic.com/563938/the-work-of-art-in-the-age-of-the-internet/



Stern, A. S., & Mateas, M. M. (2005). Facade. Electronic Literature Collection. Retrieved March 13, 2022, from https://collection.eliterature.org/2/works/mateas_facade.html



Thompson, T. T. (2020, April 23). The Story of Facade: The AI-Powered Interactive Drama. Game Developer. Retrieved March 13, 2022, from https://www.gamedeveloper.com/design/the-story-of-facade-the-ai-powered-interactive-drama
